Articles.Content:
Basically with the new 1.11 construction aspect you cant have parts over 1.25m (In my own tests) so i was thinking of a mod that could add in crew things like a mini hitch hiker or small base parts to bring to planets and moons to build small outposts before you get good at surface docking (Or know how to use kas/kis)

Something like SSPXr but Stockalike Base Parts Expansion, or NFBp (Near Future Base Parts)

So if you wanna make this good luck!

On 12/18/2020 at 2:58 AM, Souptime said:

Basically with the new 1.11 construction aspect you cant have parts over 1.25m (In my own tests) so i was thinking of a mod that could add in crew things like a mini hitch hiker or small base parts to bring to planets and moons to build small outposts before you get good at surface docking (Or know how to use kas/kis)

Something like SSPXr but Stockalike Base Parts Expansion, or NFBp (Near Future Base Parts)

So if you wanna make this good luck!  

There are some in KNES(Spacecraft folder, if you will want to prune some parts). But you will need to write configs for them to be actually usable with stock inventory system

On 12/18/2020 at 12:58 PM, Souptime said:

Basically with the new 1.11 construction aspect you cant have parts over 1.25m

Is that because they arent coded with the cargo module or is the volume too big for the storage container?
Im guessing they arent coded, cause they cant fit in any container i've tried, a few 1.25 m parts fit like the donut and the terrier but other than that i cant remember anything else
